uk.co.dancowan.robots.srv.hal.camera
Class Camera

java.lang.Object
  uk.co.dancowan.robots.srv.hal.camera.Camera
All Implemented Interfaces:
uk.co.dancowan.robots.hal.core.Component, uk.co.dancowan.robots.hal.core.ConnectionListener
public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
implements uk.co.dancowan.robots.hal.core.ConnectionListener, uk.co.dancowan.robots.hal.core.Component

Domain object to manage SRV camera data.

Exposes methods to allow colour bin setting, blob grabbing and associated vision actions. All vision commands should be directed through the Camera instance as a facade to enable state and correct response decoding.

Author:
Dan Cowan

Method Detail

setConsumer

public void setConsumer(CameraImageConsumer<java.awt.Component> consumer)
Configures the Camera with a FrameDecoder instance.

The FrameDecoder is used to turn the byte data gathered from the Connection class's input stream by the GrabImageCmd into images for rendering.

Parameters:
decoder - the FrameDecoder to use

getFrameDecoder

public FrameDecoder getFrameDecoder()
Returns the configured FrameDecoder instance.

Method returns the object passed in the last call to

Camera.setFrameDecoder(FrameDecoder)

or null if no call has yet been made.

Returns:
FrameDecoder the configured decoder

public FeatureDetector getDetector()
Returns the configured FeatureDetector object.

FeatureDetector

setResolution

public void setResolution(java.lang.String size,
                          uk.co.dancowan.robots.hal.core.CommandListener listener)
Sets the camera resolution.

This method may be called by widgets with an interest in the command events so the Command is returned to allow listeners to be attached.
